import React from 'react'; class Form extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { select: '', input0: '', input1: '', area: '', checkbox: '', } } input = (param1, param2) => { this.setState(() => ({ [param1]: param1 === 'checkbox' ? param2.target.checked : param2.target.value, })) } render() { return(
this.input('checkbox', event)} />
) } } export default Form;
